mapper.insert: insert into members (m_id, m_password, m_name, m_nickname, m_email, m_profile_image) values (#{m_id}, #{m_password},#{m_name}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_email}, #{m_profile_image})
mapper.select: select * from members where m_id = #{m_id} and m_password = #{m_password}
SELECT m_nickname FROM members WHERE m_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{m_nickname}, '%')
